titleStmt.title: M. Jenkin's recantation, or His humble acknovvledgement by way of petition to the Parliament. Wherein he confesseth his sorrow for his actions against the state, and the unsuitableness thereof to his calling and profession. As also the Parliaments answer to his petition.
titleStmt.author: Jenkyn, William, 1613-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
